lead_paragraph: The FiOS Custom TV service will begin on Sunday, and offers a base $55 monthly package that includes some customization.

headline.print_headline: Verizon to Offer Service Letting Customers Pick and Choose Channels
headline.main: Verizon to Offer Slimmer TV Channel Packages to Battle Streaming Rivals

snippet: The FiOS Custom TV service will begin on Sunday, and offers a base $55 monthly package that includes some customization.
abstract: Verizon Communications will introduce FiOS Custom TV service, which will grant customers wider variety of options to pay for channels, latest move toward flexibility that television establishment has been making in order to compete with streaming services.
